videos.title: Bohemian Border Bash Ultra Cycling Race Film -1300 km Off-Road - My First Solo Gravel Ultra
videos.description:
My first Solo Ultra Endurance Cycling Race off-road, Bohemian Border Bash! 1300 km and 24000 m of climbing. 

This fixed route, unsupported, single-stage ultra-endurance off-road cycling race circumnavigates Bohemia, crossing back and forth along national borders, riding through Germany, Austria, Poland, and the Czech Republic. 

This is an insight view into my journey going from gravel rookie to winning my first ultra-distance bikepacking off-road race.

videos.title: Bohemian Border Bash Race
videos.description: The Race is a fixed route, unsupported, single-stage ultra-endurance on & off-road cycling competition. It starts and finishes in Bohemian-Saxon Switzerland National Park. The route follows the ancient borderlands of Bohemia via the remnants of centuries-old road networks that still exist to this day. The riders will compete on their approximately 1300km long journey circumnavigating Bohemia, crossing back and forth along national borders, and riding through Germany, Austria, Poland, and the Czech Republic. With over 24,000m of climbing, it is a test of each rider's abilities and a true adventure - a race able to rival ultra-endurance events on faraway continents, yet here, in the middle of Europe.

videos.title: Czech Gravel Camp - Bohemian Border Bash camp
videos.description:
I finally left England and it felt so good! My first trip abroad in the longest time was to the Czech Republic and Germany, specifically the Bohemia and Saxony National Park and its surrounding area. The event I picked was Bohemian Border Bash camp, a weekend of gravel riding and racing. camping, music and campfires. I was so happy to be riding somewhere new and riding in company, what a blast this was!

videos.title: BOHEMIAN BORDER BASH | 75KM GRAVEL BIKE TOUR IN TSCHECHIEN 🚴
videos.description:
In dieser folge Roadbike Party geht es mit dem Gravel Bike zum Bohemian Border Bash nach Tschechien, um genau zu sein in die Sächsische Schweiz oder wie ich es nenne "Gravel Bike Praradies".

Die Gravel Bike Touren gingen über mehrere Tage mit wunderschönen Routen von 75 bis 300 Kilometer über malerische Gravel Routen.

Leider war am ersten Tag der Akku der Kamera leer und ich musste darauf verzichten am Abend zu filmen, aber keine sorge die Tage kommt der nächste teile vom Bohemian Border Bash Gravel Event.

Eine kleine Vorschau auf das was kommt findet ihr am Ende der Aktuellen Folge.
